about.name: Kayseri Travel Guide
about.title: Kayseri: The heart of Turkey
about.description: Discover Kayseri, Turkey. A place for nature, cuisine, and mountain activies. Now plan your trip!
about.excerpt: Now here is a travel guide that covers it all!
about.content:
Kayseri, located in Turkey, gives culture and beauty like no other. There are landscapes to enjoy, and a variety of adventures. You can make this a travel destination today! With a past and all to give, let's explore and dive into what it has to offer. From one mountain to another, you are sure to have a destination you love!

## See Kayseri Today!

What is the destination about? Kayseri allows for a great historical site that has something for everyone. You can ski or see what local plates can be. What do you choose?

## The List of Great Treasures

With so much to choose it can all get a bit heavy. The right way to do this would be to see what destinations have your name.

### Touch History

There is so much heart with the history. And there can never go wrong with that touch. We want to start and go to the Kültepe Arkeolojik Alanı! And end it with all the beauty that shows at Kayseri Kalesi. These two places have something for the travelers to want to book this location! The Ulu Cami shows the heart of Ottoman architecture!

### Adventure and Outdoors

This is where you will have all that love. We start it with seeing the Erciyes Dağı Kayak Merkezi for a time that all can feel. And if skiing isn't the touch check out Ali Dağı - Yamaç Paraşütü for all to admire!

### The Flavors to Eat!

There comes a time where food can offer a memory that will make you travel. We know that if we talk about Kayseri Mantısı, that has a culture that cannot be replicated. Then with more traditional touches there is the Kayseri Pastırması to enjoy.

## Now That Vacation Can Start!

What starts is what can take your heart away. Turkey has wonders and welcomes with open arms to all! Now it's about you to pack those bags and create memories with what Kayseri can make!
